info.title: WiiX-Ball
info.author: KMS
info.details:
This game is based on and dedicated to the fans of the well-known breakout game DX-Ball for the PC.
Point the Wii remote on the screen to move the paddle and press A or B to fire the ball. Up to 4 players can control the game at the same time. 

Programmed by Kirill M.

Graphics and effects:
Kirill M.
Michael P. Welch
Seumas McNally

Music:
Space Debris by captain
Team Haze Chiptune by dubmood
Candy Coast by Wiklund & Nyhlin

Please visit www.KMSZone.com
